description:
Leader of Tokyo`s http://anidb.net/ch25724 [mobile police squad].
Opposes all efforts of the http://anidb.net/ch25714 [AMP] to get a special status as independent police unit; for this purpose he goes as far as supporting an http://anidb.net/ch25771 [assault against an AMP member]. Also jointly responsible for the http://anidb.net/ch25725 ["Domull" project].
name: Boss
